Hardware setup

Welke hardware hebben we nodig?

  • Kinect for windows 2.0
  • PC met windows 8.1 64-bit

Hardware requirements volgens Microsoft

  • 64-bit processor
  • Dual-core 3.2 GHz processor of sneller
  • Dedicated USB 3.0 bus
  • 2 GB RAM
